text: __NOTOC__ Willi "Wilhelm" Fey (25 September 1918 – 29 April 2002) was a German author in the revisionist tradition. During World War II, he served in the armoured troops of the Waffen-SS. Following the war, Fey served in the Bundeswehr. ==Awards== * Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross on 29 April 1945 as SS-Oberscharführer and Panzer commander in the schwere SS-Panzer-Abteilung 502Fellgiebel 2000, p. 179. ==Notes== ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * * * ==External links== * Category:1918 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Recipients of the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross Category:Panzer commanders Category:Waffen-SS personnel Category:German Army personnel
title: Willi Fey
